mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.order_price, o.delivery_price, o.order_status, o.address_no, o.member_id, o.order_date, o.delivery_date, o.cancle_date, d.od_no, d.product_no, d.od_price, d.od_cnt FROM tbl_order o JOIN tbl_order_detail d ON o.order_no = d.order_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_order (order_no, order_price, delivery_price, order_status, address_no, member_id, order_date, delivery_date, cancle_date) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{orderPrice}, #{deliveryPrice}, #{orderStatus}, #{addressNo}, #{memberId}, #{orderDate}, #{deliveryDate}, #{cancleDate})
INSERT INTO tbl_order_detail (od_no, order_no, product_no, od_price, od_cnt) VALUES (#{odNo}, #{orderNo}, #{productNo}, #{odPrice}, #{odCnt})
